column1: Subject: Building, Real Estate, Construction and Housing
Topic: HDB Residential Units and Properties
Table Title: Properties Under The Management Of Housing And Development Board (End Of Period), Annual
Include units managed by Jurong Town Corporation (from 1973 - April 1982) and Housing and Urban Development Company (from 1976/77 - April 1982).

The Studio Apartment Scheme and 2-room Flat Scheme were merged and replaced with the 2-room Flexi Scheme from November 2015.  From November 2015, Studio Apartments are sold under the 2-Room Flexi Scheme.
Includes 3Generation flats with effect from November 2016.
From 1987, data include Multi-generation flats and executive flats.  Excludes executive condominiums.
From 1989 - 1998, data include other residential properties.  From 1999, data exclude other residential properties.  With effect from 2014, there are no HUDC flats under HDB's management.
With effect from 2018, there are no industrial units under HDB's management.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
